body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Brochures            Brochures         Getting Here:  Lincoln Boyhood National Memorial is just outside Lincoln City, IN.  From I-64, take exit 57A.  Go south on U.S. 231 to the Santa Claus/Gentryville exit.  Turn right (west) on Ind. 162; go 2 1/2 miles to the park entrance on the right NPS   You'll find many Lincoln Boyhood topics covered in depth in our free park publications. All publications on this page are in Adobe Acrobat Reader (PDF) format, and can be printed on your printer.        Lincoln Boyhood National Memorial Park Brochure    Lincoln Boyhood National Memorial Park Brochure - Spanish    Trail of Twelve Stones Trail Guide       Bird Checklist
title: Lincoln Boyhood National Memorial: Brochures
